item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.NAVIGATOR() method displays the Goto which field? dialog box. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example displays the Goto which field? dialog box. When the operator makes a selection, it displays the form and sets focus to the selected control.

section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Invoice") ptr.Navigator()
